name: MITHRILLEON (Games Academy)
description:
Mithrilleon is a short 2D Metroidvania pixelart game, which is heavily inspired by Hollow Knight, Ori and the blind forest or the Metroid series.

Rumors of a magical crystal have spread around the world. Whoever finds it will gain power over all of life. In his father’s old study room, our protagonist finds a clue to the last known location, as well as his old magical glove. Embark on an exciting journey to fulfill your father’s legacy and discover a mysterious cave where things might not be as they seem.

This game is currently still a work in progress, so some aspects (like an option menu) might be still missing. If you want to help our production, please fill out the survey: https://forms.gle/sDZPVmU6ja9w1JBP7.

Controlls (A Controller is recommended.):

 Controller:     

-Left Stick: Move     

-A: Jump     

-B: Interact     

-X: Shoot    

 -Y: Ice Punch     

-Start: Pause

Keyboard:     

-WASD: Move     

-Space: Jump    

 -J: Interact     

-E: Shoot     

-F: Ice Punch    

 -ESC: Pause

Made by Landfill Games
